コンストラクタの詳細

RS40XCB

public RS40XCB(java.lang.String portname,
               int baudrate)
パラメータ:
portname - portname
baudrate - baudrate
メソッドの詳細

move

public void move(int sId,
                 int sPos,
                 int sTime)
Move the servo to the specified angle When you watch servo from a top, a clockwise rotation is a positive value and a counterclockwise rotation is a negative value. Angle can be specified in units of 0.1 degrees. Time can be specified in units of 10 ms(Max error of 0.5%)

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
sPos - specified angle
sTime - specifued time

torque

public void torque(int sId,
                   boolean sMode)
This function flip of a switch of torque of servo.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
sMode - If sMode value is true, torque is ON.

getAngle

public int getAngle(int sId)
This function can get current angle of unit of 0.1 degrees. If movable range of center is 0, clockwise rotation range is 150 degrees and counterclockwise rotation range is -150 degrees.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
Current angle

getTime

public int getTime(int sId)
The lapsed time after starting movement is obtained in the unit for 10 ms. The last time will be held if movement is completed.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
Elapsed time

getSpeed

public int getSpeed(int sId)
This function can get current speed of unit of deg/sec. This speed is the speed of the moment.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
current speed

getLoad

public int getLoad(int sId)
This function can get load of unit of mA.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
current load

getTemperature

public int getTemperature(int sId)
This function can get of temperature of basal plate. The temperature sensor has a degree of error of + -3 due to individual differences. Protective function is activated by temperature and need to reset the servo.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
current tempreture

getVoltage

public int getVoltage(int sId)
This function can get supply voltage of unit of 10mV.. There is an error of about + - 0.3V.

パラメータ:
sId - servoID
戻り値:
supply voltage
